Speaker: You
Text: *Sigh* … … … Where is she? She was the one who planned to meet up…

Speaker: You
Text: These places depress me| why call it a business park?  The only park here are where people put their cars.

Speaker: Phone
Text: *Ring ring* *Ring ring*

Speaker: You
Text: … … .. Hello?
SORRYYYYYY

Speaker: You
Text: … Jess? What's up? Where are you?

Speaker: Jess
Text: I'm so sorry something came up| I can't make it.

Speaker: Jess
Text: But there's good news.  They want you! No interview necessary.

Speaker: You
Text: That's great| but why tell me that now that I'm here?

Speaker: Jess
Text: Well… they have heard about you and know your record.

Speaker: Jess
Text: … and recent circumstances have made the position available earlier than expected.

Speaker: Jess
Text: They are so keen in fact they want you to start tomorrow!

Speaker: You
Text: Oh?

Speaker: Jess
Text: Yep|  just come back tomorrow and we'll get you up to speed.

Speaker: You
Text: I'm starting to get a bit suspicious… What exactly happened to the last guy?

Speaker: Jess
Text: Let's just say you won't be earning the big bucks for nothing.

Speaker: Jess
Text: But! … As long as you do better than the last guy| I don't see how anything could go wrong!

Speaker: Jess
Text: Anyway! Lots of work to pick up on| I'll talk to you later 'kay? Byyyye

Speaker: You
Text: Wait maybe I should thi- *Call cuts* -ink about it first…

Speaker: You
Text: Maybe I should have stayed on holiday...
